name: Beef Carrot Sweet Ginger
description: Dive into the world of healthy eating with this Beef Carrot Sweet Ginger recipe. Perfect for those following a low-carb diet but not missing out on flavor, this dish is a testament to healthy yet delicious meals. With tender ground beef, sweet carrots, and a zing of ginger, each bite is a mix of satisfying textures and flavors, making it a great addition to your collection of healthified recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: Prep your vegetables: dice the red onion, capsicum, and carrots, and mince the ginger root.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a skillet over medium heat and add the extra virgin olive oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced red onion and minced ginger to the skillet and saut√© for about 3 minutes, until the onion is translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Increase the heat to medium-high, add the ground beef to the skillet, and cook for about 5 minutes, breaking it apart with a spoon until it's browned.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced carrots and capsicum to the skillet, stirring to integrate. Let the mixture cook for another 5 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Season the mixture with salt, sugar, and ground pepper. Mix well to ensure the seasonings are evenly distributed.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and let the mixture simmer for 5 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the skillet from heat and let the Beef Carrot Sweet Ginger mixture cool slightly before serving. Enjoy your healthy and flavorful dish!
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
